text: Charlie Brown Jr. (born August 2, 1994), known online as Cr1TiKaL ( ) or MoistCr1TiKaL ( ), is an American YouTuber, Twitch streamer, and musician. He became popular for his Let's Play videos of many video games on his penguinz0 YouTube channel. He is known for his monotone voice and deadpan comedic video commentaries. White Jr. was born on August 2, 1994, in Tampa, Florida. He studied at Carrollwood Day School and was a member of the varsity basketball team. On January 21, 2021, White won "Best Reaction Face" and "Best YouTube/Social Media Meme" in the Grandayy's Meme Awards 2020. He is also well known for criticizing other YouTubers, with many channels that he had criticized facing backlash and even deleting their channels. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Musicians from Tampa, Florida Category:American YouTubers Category:Twitch (service) streamers
title: Cr1TiKaL
